channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-2425] Test failed of CxfMtomRouterPayloadModeTest
item.description:
After upgraded the CXF version to 2.2.6, we got a random test error of CxfMtomRouterPayloadModeTest,testInvokingServiceFromCXFClient() on TeamCity
Here is the stack trace:

javax.xml.ws.soap.SOAPFaultException: Unmarshalling Error: null

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I have the impression this also sometimes happens with CAMEL 2.0.0, CXF 2.2.2. We use Tomcat 6.0.20 as HTTP server via OSGi (it therefore isn't even a problem that's Jetty-specific as mentioned in the revision's comment)
PS: I only managed to replicate this issue on CAMEL 2.0.0 and CXF 2.2.2 on a Mac. Doesn't happen on Linux or Windows.

Hi Savas,
Can you try out the latest Camel 2.2-SNAPSHOT ?
I think William already fixed that issue.
